title: Understanding Stocks
description: What stocks are, how they work, and why people invest in them.
content: Stocks represent ownership in a company and entitle the shareholder to a portion of its profits.

title: What Are ETFs?
description: A simple explanation of Exchange-Traded Funds and how to use them.
content: ETFs are investment funds traded on stock exchanges, much like stocks. They offer diversification and are a popular passive investment vehicle.

title: Risk Management
content: Risk management in investing involves identifying, analyzing, and minimizing potential losses. Techniques include diversification, setting stop-loss orders, and adjusting asset allocation.

title: Bonds 101
description: How bonds work and why theyâ€™re a key component of a balanced portfolio.
content: Bonds are fixed-income instruments that pay regular interest and are generally considered safer than stocks.

title: Options Explained
description: A beginner-friendly overview of options trading.
content: Options give investors the right (but not the obligation) to buy or sell a security at a set price before a certain date.

title: Dividends and Income Investing
description: Using dividends as a long-term income strategy.
content: Dividend investing focuses on stocks that pay regular income, providing stability and passive earnings.

title: Index Funds vs. ETFs
description: Compare passive investing tools and their benefits.
content: Both ETFs and index funds are low-cost vehicles tracking market indexes, but differ in trading flexibility and management.

title: Introduction to Technical Analysis
description: Learn the basics of charts, trends, and market indicators.
content: Technical analysis is a trading discipline that uses price charts and indicators to forecast future market movements.

title: Bond Yields and Duration
description: How to interpret bond yields and interest rate risk.
content: Understanding duration, yield to maturity, and the effects of interest rates is essential to fixed-income investing.

title: Covered Calls Strategy
description: Generate income from options while holding stocks.
content: A covered call involves owning a stock and selling a call option to earn premium income, limiting upside potential.
